title: TO_TIME
description: Converts a time string from the context user's local time zone into a standardized UTC Time.

parameters.name: string
parameters.description: The string to convert into a Time, provided in a recognized time format (e.g., 'HH:mm:ss').

examples:
TO_TIME("14:30:00"))
-- Returns a Time object for 14:30 local time in UTC.

tips.text: Accepted formats include: HH:mm:ss, HH:mm:ss.SSS, HH:mm:ss.SSSZ, HH:mm, and H.
